channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Immigrants working legally in the Texas Panhandle live in limbo under Trump’s crackdown
item.description: Confusion and fear are rippling through the immigrant communities of the Texas Panhandle, where newcomers have come for generations to work in its immense meatpacking plants.

item.title: Takeaways from AP’s report on how Trump’s immigration crackdown resonates in the Texas Panhandle
Iowa immigrant group is alarmed by a state lawmaker’s demand for confidential information
